about: As a motivated and skilled computer science graduate, I specialize in full-stack development with a focus on the MERN stack. With a strong foundation in front-end design and backend maintenance, I am dedicated to creating impactful and user-friendly digital solutions. My project experience spans from developing machine learning applications for agriculture to crafting sophisticated hotel booking platforms, all of which reflect my commitment to blending innovation with practicality. Certified in Python, Java, and MERN stack development, I am eager to leverage my skills in a challenging, growth-oriented environment. My goal is to contribute to projects that push the boundaries of technology while continuously learning from industry professionals.
